cleaned_text: Homework Chapter 2 Vaccine-Autism 5. After reading the review section of'The Anti-vaccination Movement: A Regression in Modern Medicine',summarize the impact and consequences of Wakefield's claim of a cause-and-effect relationship between the MMR vaccine and autism. 6. Although it would be highly unethical (and therefore impossible to obtain permission to do so), let's say that you want to design a genuine experiment to test the cause-and-effect relationship between the MMR vaccine and autism.
